EmailTemplate.subject: An exciting opportunity brought to you by The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Brought to you by The Challenge
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, We imagine that a lot has changed for you since you completed NCS. While you're probably excited about finishing school or college, you may also be anxious about what decisions to make about your future. That’s why we want to tell you about a great opportunity brought to you by The Challenge called Step Forward. www.stepforward.uk.com What is it?
Step Forward is a 12 month paid work placement that helps you kick start your future. We find you a job for a year, pay you £9,000 and offer training to make you one of the most employable young people in the country. Throughout the year you'll work with a team of friends, just like on NCS, and we'll support you with whatever comes next. Step Forward is a great way to get experience before heading to uni or offers the opportunity to launch your career with no student debt.
Who's it for? Going to university? Step Forward allows you to get experience before university to make you more employable when you graduate. Want the independence of working but unsure how to progress in your career? Step Forward is your opportunity to fast track your future, giving you the skills and experience to succeed and allows you to develop the professional netoworks you need to get ahead. Want a constructive and meaningful Gap Year? With Step Forward you get paid £9,000, gain invaluable transferable skills and meet new people. Want to keep your options open, but don’t know how? Step Forward will provide you with your own professional mentor who will support you as you determine your path. What next? As a graduate of NCS with The Challenge, you have the exclusive option of applying to Step Forward before others even hear about it. If this sounds like something you want to hear more about, take 30 seconds to express your interest here. Alternatively, you can submit an application now to be considered for our next assessment event in November. Please log in using your email address and pin/password below to make an application. Email: {!Contact.Email} Pin: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c} Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c} For more information visit www.stepforward.uk.com Step Forward is a competitive programme, and places are limited so avoid missing out by applying as soon as possible. Best wishes, The Challenge - Step Forward Team
